game.name: The Last Caretaker
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, Simulation, Early Access

game.shortDescription: The Last Caretaker is a thoughtful take on the survival-crafting genre, where every decision you make and every action has a consequence. It offers a deep world exploration experience where step-by-step, you uncover the truth behind the reawakening of the last caretaker.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Last Caretaker is a thoughtful take on the survival-crafting genre, where every decision you make and every action has a consequence. It offers a deep world exploration experience where step-by-step, you uncover the truth behind the reawakening of the last caretaker.

reviewHighlights.text: This is an enjoyable game that scratches the open world survival craft itch, but I can't recommend in the current early access stage. [b]The Good[/b]...
Good for a new release but HOLY HELL does it need graphical optimization. Wait a year for them to make it playable, or build yourself a supercomputer.
